products.notes: A dark ruby red beer rich in fruitcake aromas, almonds and conserved fruit.
products.name: Broadside

products.notes: A seasonal collaboration with Siren brewery, expect mango and guava flavours, subtly enhanced by a sweetish finish..
products.name: Secret Springs

products.notes: A rewarding English Pale Ale showcasing English hops; produced as a nod to the hardworking families of Bermondsey, who would travel to Kent during the hop picking or 'Oppin' Season, spending their holidays picking hops for local breweries
products.name: Bermondsey Pale

products.notes: Taking inspiration from our flagship beer, The Porter, we wanted to brew a truly sessionable London Porter. What better way to create an effortlessly drinkable dark beer than to make it nitro. The resulting creaminess and smooth mouthfeel balance perfectly with the subtle roasted notes of coffee and chocolate. The beer brings together the rich history and heritage of London Porters, with the modern techniques of brewing nitro beers. The result is a beer that is easy drinking, without sacrificing its character.
products.name: London Black

products.notes: Sweet caramel, assertive bitterness and tropical fruit flavours, hopped with Azacca, Hallertau Blanc and Chinook.
products.name: Amber Haze

products.notes: Classic blonde ale, light, sweet malt and subtle citrus on the finish.
products.name: Ixworth Blonde GF

products.notes: Brewed with Cryo hops: Talus and Idaho 7 plus a New England yeast strain isolated from Boddingtons! The resultant IPA is a juicy banger !
products.name: Pit Lane Project: Cryo IPA

products.notes: Traditional English Bitter. A rich base of English malts is layered with additions of delicate English hops for a perfectly balanced amber bitter
products.name: Sinc Stream

products.notes: Golden, true-to-style IPA brewed with malted Maris Otter barley and a blast of Boadicea hops.
products.name: Golden Close

products.notes: Straw coloured, easy drinking session bitter with floral, citrus flavours courtesy of New Zealand Green Bullet hops.
products.name: Norfolk Topper

products.notes: Pale session beer infused with Canadian lowbush blueberries.
products.name: Bluebeary

products.notes: A refreshing blonde summer ale, the hoppy bitterness balanced by the sweet aroma of peaches and elderflower.
products.name: Peach Melbear

products.notes: Strong mild, sweet and malty flavours with subtle bitterness from Admiral and Challenger hops.
products.name: Quantock

products.notes: Robust and refreshing IPA crafted with single variety hops.
products.name: The Dry Road

products.notes: Golden beer, with a balance of hops for a gentle bitterness and a refreshing hint of citrus.
products.name: Worth the Wait

products.notes: A hoppy golden ale with a lasting finish. A complex blend of late hopping is at work here, but the hops are balanced with a steady base of malt and bitterness, with only the merest hint of grapefruit and citrus.
products.name: Golden Torc

products.notes: a red ale made with rye. It has fruit, berries and hops on the nose. Tangy fresh hop and crystal rye notes burst onto the palate and linger temptingly in the finish
products.name: Red Queen

products.notes: A robust American pale ale with refreshing hints of citrus and pine.
products.name: Lonesome Pine

products.notes: A full-bodied rye IPA with a long dry finish, it's strong and hoppy, with spicy, woody and resinous notes.
products.name: The Ryddler

products.notes: Softer and smoother than a stout, this is an amped-up version of a dark mild.
products.name: Double Dark Mild

products.notes: Dark, rich, deeply moreish 6.0% stout with a huge grain bill. The complex malt character totally dominates with roasty notes.
products.name: Gods of the Underworld

products.notes: Pale ale hopped with Citra in the kettle, before being double dry hopped with Ekuanot. The result is a 5.3% delight, bursting with citrus and tropical fruit.
products.name: Such A Scream

products.notes: Deep chocolate old ale with a dash of Grand Marnier.
products.name: Chockwork Orange Grand Marnier

products.notes: A dark brown mild with a hint of maple syrup.
products.name: Marvellous Maple Mild

products.notes: A thoroughbred American Red IPA that takes its fruit notes from Cascade and Chinook, balanced with the depth of Vienna and Munich malt.
products.name: Cardinaldred

products.notes: Produced in collaboration with Brew York, this extra special bitter is named for the Roman road connecting Cambridge and York.
products.name: Ermine Street Bitter

products.notes: A deep red ale brewed in the style of a traditional German Dunkel, using malt solely from Munich and hops found in Hereford and Kent. Subtle notes of toffee and malt envelop the taste profile.
products.name: The Eyes of Moddey Dhoo

products.notes: Brewed using Mosaic, Harlequin and El Dorado hops. Giving notes of citrus fruits, pine and pineapple.
products.name: Tropical Breeze

products.notes: Rich and smooth, our dark mild ale uses a variety of speciality malts to create an unctuously flavourful beer that belies its low gravity.
products.name: Dark Mild

products.notes: Burning Sky's noted Extra Stock is the most traditional of ales. Three oak vats held the base beer for over four years where it developed a gentle brettanomyces and succulent marmalade character. A fresh beer was brewed specifically to blend with it to bring a youthful frivolity to the table.
products.name: Extra Stock Ale

products.notes: Deep gold in colour and full-bodied, with a grassy aroma from Fuggle hops, a big hit of malt and a medium bitter finish.
products.name: Double Beer Fuggled

products.notes: Straw coloured, slightly cloudy. Fruity aromas with hints of orange. Fruity in the mouth with classic wheat flavours. Peppery finish with a slight orange note. Great cold on a hot summer day.
products.name: Moulin D'Etienne Wit Bier

products.notes: A small stout with a big flavour.
products.name: Small Stout

products.notes: Hazy and full-flavoured, packed with American hops.
products.name: Good Intentions

products.notes: A rich complex dark stout porter with delicious chocolate and coffee character.
products.name: Night Porter

products.notes: West Coast pale ale, resinous with a piney bitterness.
products.name: Curveball

products.notes: Bursting with orange notes, a bitter finish and a bright, clean appearance.
products.name: Never A Frown

products.notes: Light coloured malts giving way to citrus and grassy hop notes produce a balanced, session beer.
products.name: Hopping Toad

products.notes: Amber beer, malty and floral with grassy hop notes.
products.name: Salters Tree

products.notes: A punchy, fragrant American pale with a huge Columbus burst that complements the smooth malt bill.
products.name: Kandata

products.notes: For the latest in our In Your Heart series we embrace the Belma hop to create a Pale Ale that is soft, smooth and saturated in flavour. This hop brings together a complexity to the beer, imparting fruity notes alongside distinct strawberry flavours to create a wonderfully juicy beer.
products.name: Belma In Your Heart

products.notes: A deliciously strong cask Old ale. Unique aromas of bubblegum, rum & raisin and deep caramel combine with complex flavours of bourbon, coffee and dark chocolate. Malt-led with a dry fruit bitterness, this ale has a light, drinkable body and a satisfying finish
products.name: Piccadilly Star

products.notes: A smooth, pale straw-coloured beer, slightly sweet on first taste with a clean blueberry finish.
products.name: Blueberry Classic

products.notes: A blend of 30 month old golden ales. Spontaneously fermented and aged in neutral French oak. Refermented on Morello cherries from Kent and Juneberries from Worcestershire.
products.name: Long Ladders

products.notes: A blend of 32 month old golden ales. Spontaneously fermented and aged in neutral French oak. Dry-hopped with Jester grown in Herefordshire, UK.
products.name: Mare's Tail

products.notes: A traditional mild recipe but full-bodied with bags of malty flavour. Black cherry, cola and toffee flavours with a caramel finish and berry aroma.
products.name: Back Sack & Quack

products.notes: A highly quaffable, refreshing ale, it's well balanced with a delightful aroma, citrus notes from the hops and a subtle ginger flavour.
products.name: Ginger Ninja

products.notes: Smooth, sweet milk stout.
products.name: My Milk Stout Brings All the Bulls to the Yard

products.notes: Golden mild brewed with coriander.
products.name: White Elephant

products.notes: Chestnut beer brewed with Fuggles, Challenger, Goldings, Jester and Emperor hops, full and juicy, complex beer.
products.name: Coronation Ale

products.notes: New World style, hop-forward pale ale.
products.name: New World Session

products.notes: Dark, roast flavours of coffee and chocolate.
products.name: North Brink Porter

products.notes: An old style mild, strong but carefully hopped to allow the malts to flourish, with hint of liquorice balancing the lasting nutty finish.
products.name: Nightlight Mild

products.notes: This ale leaves a rich dark Oloroso flavour in tne mouth. The superb pairing of Maris Otter and First Gold hops, combine with the depth of alcohol to produce distinctly manana-ish pleasure.
products.name: Terra Firma

products.notes: A New England inspired session IPA that brings bags of tropical & citrus fruits on the palette with a floral aroma. A low bitterness makes this a super smooth approachable drop.
products.name: Chaff

products.notes: A coffee milk stout brewed with locally roasted beans from our friends at Atkinsons coffee roasters. Roasted coffee & chocolate notes on the palate rounded off with a smooth sweet finish from the addition of lactose.
products.name: Hoof

products.notes: Notes of bittersweet dark chocolate; earthiness, dark fruit & berries and light brett aroma on the nose. The Brettonamyces yeast consumes complex sugars that saccharomyces can't, making Derailed a lot less sweet than Railway Porter. Derailed has dry and light body, which complements and balances the complex flavours.
products.name: Derailed Porter

products.notes: Session pale ale, single-hopped with Simcoe.
products.name: Everyone Loves Simcoe

products.notes: A dark amber-coloured, bittersweet ale with an aroma of caramel malt and a touch of toffee, followed by a hint of lemon and finishing on a good bitter hoppy note.
products.name: Highlander

products.notes: Light but quite strong ale based solely on the Nelson Sauvin hop.
products.name: Hodders Panama

products.notes: Light but quite strong ale based solely on the Mosiac hop.
products.name: Sunken Church

products.notes: Fermented with lager yeast at a warmer temperature like a traditional steam beer, dry-hopped for fruity flavours and with Vienna malt for gentle biscuit flavours.
products.name: California Common

products.notes: A deep, dark and rich smoked porter, brewed with a complex blend of malts.
products.name: Slate

products.notes: Unfiltered cloudy wheat beer, sharp and refreshing, with flavours of orange, clove and citrus.
products.name: Weizen

products.notes: Export stout brewed with molasses and three roasted malts giving fruity flavours with hints of vanilla and roasted coffee -- a rich plum pudding in a glass.
products.name: Baltic Trader

products.notes: Fruity, chocolatey, rich and fulsome, well-balanced with hops, yet smooth.
products.name: Lurcher Stout

products.notes: A light wheat beer with grainy citrus and marmalade flavours, now brewed with Citra hops.
products.name: Orange Wheat

products.notes: Aromas of dry chocolate and roasted malts followed up with a hint of coffee and bitter chocolate flavours.
products.name: Penton Oatmeal Stout

products.notes: With a dense concentration of varied malts and hops, this unusually sweet and sour beer has roast, alcoholic and spicy notes.
products.name: Imperial Extra Double Stout

products.notes: Full-bodied brown bitter. A hoppy aroma leads to a good malt and hop balance, and a dry aftertaste.
products.name: Sussex Best Bitter

products.notes: Deliciously smooth classic milk stout with a chocolatey sweetness.
products.name: Milk Stout

products.notes: Dark and full-bodied with roasted malt, subtle dried fruit flavours and a light bitterness to finish.
products.name: Old Ale

products.notes: A full flavoured 1930s malt forward English Mild. Hopped with Kentish Fuggles & Goldings. Hints of dark fruit and caramel, with a gentle hop bitterness.
products.name: Watling St Mild

products.notes: This Brown Ale has plenty of character, loaded with biscuit and chocolate malts but balanced with a mix of English and American hops.
products.name: Evening Brown

products.notes: Traditional old-school stout with plenty of flavour.
products.name: No Man

products.notes: A full-flavoured best bitter brewed with six malts and a trio of hops, resulting in a full-bodied ruby coloured ale.
products.name: You've Sean'd It

products.notes: Fresh aromas of wild honey flowers, citrus and spice for a refreshing brew.
products.name: Honey Trap

products.notes: A smooth red IPA with malty character, topped with a subtle hint of American hops to provide balance.
products.name: Red IPA

products.notes: Dark and hoppy with the easy-drinking qualities of a golden ale.
products.name: Black Gold

products.notes: Golding and Fuggle hops, with a rich variety of Kent malts .
products.name: Kent Golding Bitter

products.notes: Rich, malty old ale.
products.name: Crow Bar

products.notes: A warming mild-bodied ale with a slightly nutty flavour and aged for more than three months for a rich taste.
products.name: Old Nogg

products.notes: Notes of berries and figs enhance the complex depths of this strong ale with a lovely velvety mouthfeel.
products.name: Yarmouth Strong

products.notes: A rich mahogany-coloured mild with notes of hedgerow berries, smooth caramel and lightly roasted malt.
products.name: Dark Mild

products.notes: Our Transatlantic Pale was created to highlight a great blend of English and American hops, in a cask beer format. Amarillo, Cascade, Endeavour and Challenger combine, for notes of lemon, matcha, and orange blossom. With a gentle bitterness and crisp finish.
products.name: Transatlantic Pale

products.notes: Earthy pale with Euro hops
products.name: Beard Oil

products.notes: Pale golden ale with tropical fruit aroma and a citrusy bitter finish.
products.name: Big Bad Wolf

products.notes: Light refreshing summer IPA.
products.name: Summer IPA

products.notes: Gentle and balanced, with Pilsner malt and Magnum, Perle and Tettnang hops.
products.name: Helles

products.notes: Peachy, citrussy, easy-drinking pale.
products.name: Wanna Go to the Sun

products.notes: A dark bitter stout, its roast and nut aromas combine with a fruity balance of hops and dark malt for an excellent lingering finish.
products.name: Black Adder

products.notes: Zesty and refreshing with notes of citrus and apricot from the hops and nicely balanced malts.
products.name: Gung Ho

products.notes: Caramel and dark berry with aromatic hints of wood and toffee. Malt flavours and a strong hop finish.
products.name: Saxon Strong

products.notes: A blonde fruity ale brewed with Golden Naked oats and Vienna malts for a good body, balanced with bitterness and aroma from Citra and Simcoe hops.
products.name: Citra Blonde

products.notes: Cask-conditioned German-style lager brewed with Pilsner malt and Tettnang and Hallertau hops for a clean, smooth fresh flavour.

products.notes: Powerfully hopped, full-flavoured IPA, with a long lingering bitter finish.

products.notes: Black rich smooth creamy porter with a subtle hint of honey.
products.name: Honey Porter

products.notes: Continental-style fruit beer with a subtle hint of raspberries.
products.name: Raspberry Wheat

products.notes: Brewed with extra pale Maris Otter malt and experimental and unusual hops.
products.name: Beerset

products.notes: Imperial Roman stout, bursting with dark, roasty flavour with an underlying vanilla richness.

products.notes: A satisfying, full-flavoured black brew with a good balance of malt, roast and fruit. Bittersweet flavours carry through to a dry finish.
products.name: Nero

products.notes: Fruit and some hops on the nose lead into a fine balance of malt, fruit and hops on a bittersweet base, with a malty, long, dry finish.
products.name: Pegasus

products.notes: Crisply hoppy, with powerful tropical fruit flavours and satisfyingly bitter finish.
products.name: Saturnalia

products.notes: Pale-coloured and well-balanced with a smooth malt profile, complemented by a restrained hop flavour.
products.name: Cambridge Pale Ale

products.notes: Sweet stout with rich malty flavours thanks to dark roasted malts blended with oats and wheat for a mellow, silky smooth and juicy rich stout.
products.name: Cellarman's Stout

products.notes: Golden, lush hoppy beer.
products.name: Heavenly Matter

products.notes: Bold, bright and bitter, a zesty combination of orange, grapefruit and lemon with a moreish finish.
products.name: Citrus Kiss

products.notes: A flavourful meld of roasted notes with hints of nuts, chocolate and caramel.
products.name: Fusioneer

products.notes: Rich, raisin-sweet, light copper-coloured bitter.
products.name: Recessive Red

products.notes: Double dry-hopped pale with Ekuanot, Citra, Idaho 7 and Sabro for juicy, tropical and stone fruit flavours.

products.notes: 24-month barrel-aged Imperial stout meets an easy-drinking table stout, it's smooth and malty with underlying vanilla, oak and caramel.

products.notes: Delightful, dark, easy-drinking mild with subtle hints of fruit and a bitter finish.

products.notes: A complex, satisfying porter, smooth and distinctive. Roast malt and fruit feature on the palate and the finish is powerfully hoppy.

products.notes: Light fruity beer with apricot flavours.
products.name: Stour Valley Gold

products.notes: Rich, biscuity malt and a dry finish.

products.notes: A full-flavoured amber ale made with specialty malts from Germany, balanced by a rich mix of international hops.

products.notes: Blonde beer brewed with eight different American hops, with flavours of citrus and stone fruits.

products.notes: Golden beer featuring a hop bonanza of Citra and Mosaic hops.

products.notes: A strong premium beer, dominated by elaborate fruity hop notes, with a grainy background and dry finish.
products.name: Bishops Farewell

products.notes: Deep red in colour, full-bodied in taste, Kaleidoscope's roast and crystal malts mellow for a rich, hoppy finish.

products.notes: Mount Hood's mild herbal and floral notes, lemon citrus fruit and light honey sweetness lead on to a refreshingly bitter finish in this very special Celebration Ale.

products.notes: Imperial stout with roast malt, cocoa, caramel, fudge and treacle flavours.
products.name: Good King Henry

products.notes: A classic pale ale, brewed from British pale malt and US Cascade hops. Smooth, fruity and full-bodied, with a deceptive bitterness to complement its alcohol strength. Refreshing citrus hop aromas complete the sensory pleasure.

products.notes: Full-flavoured, low-alcohol golden ale with Styrian hops.
products.name: Alfred's Curfew Bell

products.notes: A 'praiseworthy' hoppy ale.
products.name: Trinity

products.notes: Full-flavoured, premium amber IPA, with New Zealand hops.
products.name: Beast of the East

products.notes: Refreshingly clean ginger wheat beer with a distinct fiery kick.
products.name: Ginger Panther

products.notes: Traditional conker-coloured mild with light roasted malt flavours.
products.name: Mild Thing

products.notes: A subtle malt aroma and strong hop finish from the East Kent Golding hops.
products.name: Whispering Grass

products.notes: Wild table beer, hopped with citra and fermented for an extended period with our mother culture of wild yeasts. Funky, hoppy, light, refreshing, dry.
products.name: A Tavola

products.notes: Unfined banana split sour beer with bananas, strawberries, cherries and vanilla.
products.name: Banana Split

products.notes: Unfined pineapple sour, IPA dry hopped with Bru-1.
products.name: Catenaccio

products.notes: A low-alcohol citrus sour beer, it's zingy, juicy and refreshing.
products.name: Citrus Sour

products.notes: Pastore x Balance Brewing and Blending, a rustic saison made with heritage malts, aged hops and fermented in stainless steel with our mother culture of wild yeasts. Fruity, funky, acidic, dry.
products.name: Equilibro

products.notes: Sour beer with peaches, ginger, cinnamon and vanilla. A sweet dessert sour with rich spiced peaches and smooth vanilla.
products.name: Peach Cobbler

products.notes: An unfined zingy, dry and refreshing Berliner Weisse style sour beer with fruit.
products.name: Waterbeach Weisse

products.notes: Tart, with plenty of honeydew melon for a balanced sweetness.
products.name: Melon Wave

products.notes: Bohemian-inspired IPA with citrus tropical aromatics and traditional lager yeast bringing a crisp, clean finish.
products.name: Old Tech

products.notes: This version of Bisexual Lighting is bright citrus and tropical on the nose, and more of the same on the palate with a little bitterness, some extra berry character, and yet more citrus. Papaya, tangerine, lemon, peach, apricot.
products.name: Bisexual Lighting - Mosaic & El Dorado

products.notes: Expect lemon, lime, grapefruit, a little juicy orange and a touch of pith from this juicy pale ale, with Citra, Centennial, Cashmere and Azacca hops.
products.name: Citrussy

products.notes: Rich and luscious chocolate stout. A slice of chocolate cake in a glass.
products.name: Queer Joy! Queer Power!

products.notes: A copper-coloured, easy-drinking beer, with well-balanced malt and hop flavours and a long, refreshing and clean finish.
products.name: IPA

products.notes: A deep ruby, complex and flavoursome beer, packed with intense and distinctive malt and hop character.
products.name: Roasted Nuts

products.notes: Very refreshing golden beer with strong citrus notes . The strong bitterness is softened by a little sweet malt character, with a lingering dryness.
products.name: Trinity

products.notes: Dark Mild made with multiple types of darker malt for layers of flavour.  The dark colour of this beer comes from chocolate malt, avoiding the sometimes burnt wood astringent taste that can come from black malt
products.name: Black Knight Mild

products.notes: Pale ale using a wine yeast and the unique New Zealand Nelson Sauvin hops for wine-like flavours.
products.name: Crafty Sauvignon

products.notes: Tart and refreshing raspberry wheat ale with summer fruit flavours.
products.name: Redstone

products.notes: Chocolatey, nutty flavour from a malt, with Brewers Gold and East Kent Golding hops for bitterness and Bramling Cross for a spicy, fruity aroma.
products.name: Cavendish Red

products.notes: A premium tawny ale brewed with a blend of speciality barley and wheat malts. Admiral and Aramis hops provide a satisfying bitterness with late additions of Palisade and Brewer's Gold for a spicy, rich flavour and subtle fruit aroma.
products.name: Saints Reserve

products.notes: A modern Double IPA, packed with mouthwatering new world hops.  Bursting with fresh pine, passion fruit and citrus flavours from Columbus, Summit, Equanot and Amarillo hops and brewed with Maris Otter pale malts for a full strength beast of an ale!
products.name: Vulcan DIPA

products.notes: Full-bodied English best bitter.
products.name: 4Wood

products.notes: Strong golden bitter with lots of fruity Citra hops.
products.name: Affinity

products.notes: Liquid Mistress is our femme fatale -- mysterious, seductive and disarming. She draws and charms drinkers with her full, red colours. You will soon desire her biscuit-and-burnt-raisin malt base, and peach and grapefruit spark.
products.name: Liquid Mistress

products.notes: Hazy pale ale.
products.name: Suspended in Comet

products.notes: Soft, juicy and hopped with Mosaic and Citra for delicious stone fruit goodness.
products.name: Mallard

products.notes: This English pale mild is the ultimate session beer, with a toasty, biscuity malt base balanced with the classic flavours of Golding hops.
products.name: Parus

products.notes: Golden ale with complex noble hops, moderate bitterness and a smooth, slightly caramel finish.
products.name: Edinburgh Gold

products.notes: Refreshingly drinkable pilsner/pale ale hybrid. The recipe is a nod to the US pre-prohibition era so its Liberty hops to add a refreshing essence of citrus, grapes, peaches and vanilla. Easy drinker for all, contains honey.
products.name: Pre-Prohibition Cream Ale

products.notes: Juicy Oatmeal IPA with Amarillo Hops and lots of Galaxy. Think punchy passionfruit, juicy peach and tangy citrus. One of our quickest selling beers last time out of the blocks.
products.name: Riotous Oat Break

products.notes: Super, light, super tasty table pale full of mandarin oranges. Perfect light beer for the Spring & Summer.
products.name: The Mandarin Candidate

products.notes: A deep crimson beer, naturally coloured from the whole cherries in the fermentation process. With its long dry tart finish and ripe cherry notes on the nose.
products.name: Cherry

products.notes: This Dubbel has a rich chocolatey nose with a dash of toasted barley, which draws out the complexity of the demerara on to your palate. Aged for a number of weeks but holds its fresh and vibrant finish.
products.name: Dubbel

products.notes: Mixed fermentation saison with sour cherry flavours.
products.name: Bire de Saison - Sour Cherry

products.notes: Dark brown beer that promises coffee and cocoa, with hops bringing lightness, brightness and fruit.
products.name: Export India Porter

products.notes: Golden blonde beer with a passionfruit, gooseberry and mango aroma. An initial sweetness and full body are balanced by a lasting grapefruit-like bitter finish.

products.notes: A creamy, rich porter with a floral hop flourish, coffee and chocolate character and a mild roast aftertaste.

products.notes: A New England IPA hopped with Citra, Sabro and Amarillo for tropical fruit, tangerine and coconut flavours.

products.notes: Debuting at the festival, this New England pale ale features Citra and Galaxy hops for mango and peach flavours with a dank finish..
products.name: Citra & Galaxy

products.notes: A collaboration with Brew Board, this rich, luscious, treacly stout features a molasses sweetness, forest fruits, fig and plum flavours.

products.notes: Silky smooth and sweet chocolate and vanilla milk porter made with organic cocoa and vanilla pods.

products.notes: Expect pine, lemon and orange flavours from this West Coast pale ale hopped with Centennial, Columbus, Amarillo and Lemondrop, finishing on a gentle bitter note.

products.notes: All the body and hop punch of a regular NEIPA, just less of the ABV. Big hit of white grape, lemon and lime.

products.notes: Amber ale brewed with stem ginger for a delicious aroma and flavour.

products.notes: Amber red featuring Munich malt and Czech Lebelski hops for a crisp European lager flavour.

products.notes: Fresh and easy-drinking with aromas of pine, peach, lychee and citrus.

products.notes: A hoppy, thirst-quenching golden session bitter, with a flowery nose and slightly citrus aftertaste.

products.notes: A clean golden ale with a floral citrus finish.

products.notes: Deep, ruby-red ale with a rich, chocolatey taste and notes of liquorice and treacle.

products.notes: A shockingly aromatic brew with tropical, citrus, floral and pine notes.

products.notes: Award-winning, fresh and zesty bitter with crisp floral flavours, a background of sweet malt and a hoppy grapefruit finish.

products.notes: Golden lager in the Munich style with a biscuity body, gentle bitter sweetness and an easy finish.

products.notes: Evergreen and tropical fruit aroma with malty backbone and a refreshing dry bitter finish.

products.notes: Well-balanced session pale with a subtle citrus nose and a slight bitter back palate.

products.notes: Smooth,deceptive beer with liquorice overtones and a discreet toffee finish.
